text:
Hey all, this time we are going to brag a little bit :D: after having good success on reddit, we decided to try putting <https://www.producthunt.com/posts/wasp-lang-alpha|Wasp (Alpha) on Product Hunt> and we managed to end up on the first place yesterday!!
After pushing hard on development during the summer, we are now again balancing between developing the compiler/language and on the other hand building a community, getting first testers, contributors, so getting some exposure on Product Hunt helps with this.
We are done with "launching" Alpha for now, but we do plan to continue reaching out to people by writing hopefully relevant/valuable blog posts.

attachments.title: Wasp-lang Alpha - Develop web apps in React & Nodejs with no boilerplate | Product Hunt
attachments.text: Wasp is an open source configuration language (DSL) for developing, building and deploying full-stack web apps with less boilerplate. It integrates with React, Node.js and Prisma. Wasp is in Alpha right now. Check it out on <https://wasp-lang.dev/>
attachments.fallback: Product Hunt: Wasp-lang Alpha - Develop web apps in React & Nodejs with no boilerplate | Product Hunt
